item.title: Skill cape emotes
item.dc:creator: @Fender94 Fender94
item.description:
@Fender94 wrote:

Okay so I added them to the cache and they are gziped, but the folder “models” wasnt there so it created it, do i have to edit something in the client files so it loads those or just go ahead and say the “add model ####” in-game?

I also dont have the class20 or class23 files in my client.

Read full topic

item.title: Skill cape emotes
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

welll… you just gzip them, rename them some number between 5000 - 15000, put them in model folder and in-game say “add model ####”

I know that didn’t make sense a bit but you can reread the model tutorial in the sections that teach you how to add to client.

Read full topic

item.title: Skill cape emotes
item.dc:creator: @Fender94 Fender94
item.description:
@Fender94 wrote:

How would I go about adding skill cape emotes to my server and client?

I’m using Soul Split source.

I have this so far that i got from another thread, this in the right direction?

In client.java

[code]public void SkillCape() {

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9748) { //attack
stillgfx(611, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4959);
sendMessage(“You do your skillcape emote”);

playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9775) { //herblore
stillgfx(626, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4969);
sendMessage(“You do your Skillcape emote.”);

playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9772) { //agility
stillgfx(625, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4978);
sendMessage(“You do your Skillcape emote.”);

playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9751) { //strength
stillgfx(614, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4981);

    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9754) { //Defence
stillgfx(621, absY, absX);

setAnimation(4961);
sendMessage(“You do your skillcape emote”);
